name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dennis ISAAC, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dennis ISAAC, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Morris, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
429 A.2d 639
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dennis ISAAC, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 29, 1981.
Decided May 22, 1981.
John W. Morris, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
